00033 class SpectrumBase : private boost::noncopyable {
00034 public:
00035   typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00036 
00037   SpectrumBase(double sampleRate,
00038                double centerFrequency)
00039     : sampleRate_(sampleRate)
00040     , centerFrequency_(centerFrequency) {}
00041   virtual ~SpectrumBase() {}
00042 
00044   double sampleRate() const { return sampleRate_; }
00046   double centerFrequency() const { return centerFrequency_; }
00047   
00049   virtual size_t size()                         const = 0;
00050   virtual complex_type operator[](size_t index) const = 0;
00051   virtual double normWindow()                   const = 0;
00052 
00055   size_t freq2index(double qrg_Hz) const { // get the nearest bin index
00056     // clamp to f0 +- fs/2
00057     qrg_Hz = std::min(qrg_Hz, centerFrequency() + sampleRate()/2);
00058     qrg_Hz = std::max(qrg_Hz, centerFrequency() - sampleRate()/2);
00059     const int n(size());
00060     int i(round(double(n)*(qrg_Hz - centerFrequency()) / sampleRate()));
00061     ASSERT_THROW(-n/2 <= i && i <= n/2);
00062     // make sure that +f0 and -f0 do not get the same index
00063     if (i == n/2) i -= 1;
00064     return (i>=0) ? i : n+i;
00065   }
00066 
00068   double index2freq(size_t index) const {
00069     const int n(size());
00070     return centerFrequency() + sampleRate() * (int(index) < n/2
00071                                                ?    int(index)
00072                                                : -n+int(index))/double(n);
00073   }  
00074 private:
00075   static int round(double d) { return int(d+((d>=0.0) ? .5 : -.5)); }
00076 
00077   double sampleRate_;
00078   double centerFrequency_;
00079 } ;
00080 
00082 template<typename FFT_TYPE>
00083 class FFTSpectrum : public SpectrumBase {
00084 public:
00085   FFTSpectrum(const FFT_TYPE& fftw,
00086               double sampleRate,
00087               double centerFrequency)
00088     : SpectrumBase(sampleRate, centerFrequency)
00089     , fftw_(fftw) {}
00090   virtual ~FFTSpectrum() {}
00091 
00092   virtual size_t size() const { return fftw_.size(); }
00093   virtual complex_type operator[](size_t index) const { return fftw_.getBin(index); }  
00094   virtual double normWindow() const { return fftw_.normWindow(); }
00095 
00096 protected:
00097 private:
00098   const FFT_TYPE& fftw_;
00099   double sampleRate_;
00100   double centerFrequency_;
00101 } ;
00102 
00104 template<typename T>
00105 class frequency_vector {
00106 public:
00107   typedef double freq_type;
00108   typedef typename std::pair<freq_type, T> value_type;
00109   typedef typename std::vector<value_type> vector_type;
00110   typedef typename vector_type::iterator iterator;
00111   typedef typename vector_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00112 
00113   frequency_vector(freq_type fmin=freq_type(0), 
00114                    freq_type fmax=freq_type(1))
00115     : fmin_(fmin), fmax_(fmax) {}
00116   
00117   frequency_vector(freq_type fmin, freq_type fmax, size_t size, const T& value)
00118     : fmin_(fmin),
00119       fmax_(fmax),
00120       v_(size) {
00121     for (unsigned u(0); u<size; ++u)
00122       v_[u]= std::make_pair(fmin+(fmax-fmin)/(size-1)*u, value);
00123   }
00124   
00125   template<typename FUNCTION>
00126   frequency_vector(freq_type fmin, freq_type fmax,
00127                    const SpectrumBase& s, FUNCTION func, double offset_ppb=0.)
00128     : fmin_(fmin), fmax_(fmax) { fill(s, func, offset_ppb); }
00129 
00130   frequency_vector(const frequency_vector& f) 
00131     : fmin_(f.fmin_), fmax_(f.fmax_), v_(f.v_) {} 
00132 
00133   frequency_vector& operator=(const frequency_vector& f) {
00134     if (&f != this) {
00135       frequency_vector tmp(f);
00136       std::swap(fmin_, tmp.fmin_);
00137       std::swap(fmax_, tmp.fmax_);
00138       std::swap(v_,    tmp.v_);
00139     }
00140     return *this;
00141   }
00142  
00143   freq_type fmin() const { return fmin_; }
00144   freq_type fmax() const { return fmax_; }
00145   freq_type deltaf() const { return (v_.size() > 1) ? 0.0 : (fmax() - fmin()) / (size()-1); }
00146 
00149   template<typename FUNCTION>
00150   frequency_vector<T>& fill(const SpectrumBase& s, const FUNCTION& func, double offset_ppb=0.) {
00151     const double correction_factor(1. - 1e-9*offset_ppb);
00152 
00153     // find nearest frequency bin
00154     const size_t i0(s.freq2index(fmin()));
00155     fmin_ = s.index2freq(i0);
00156 
00157     // find nearest frequency bin
00158     const size_t i1(s.freq2index(fmax()));
00159     fmax_ = s.index2freq(i1);
00160 
00161     if (i0 <= i1) {
00162       const size_t n(1+i1-i0);
00163       if (v_.size() != n) v_.resize(n);
00164       for (size_t u(i0); u<=i1; ++u) {
00165         const double f(s.index2freq(u));
00166         const size_t ucal(s.freq2index(correction_factor*f));
00167         v_[u -i0    ] = std::make_pair(f, func(s[ucal]));
00168       }
00169     } else {
00170       const size_t n0(s.size()); // length of FFT spectrum
00171       const size_t n(1 + n0-i0 + i1);
00172       if (v_.size() != n) v_.resize(n);
00173       for (size_t u(i0); u<n0; ++u) {
00174         const double f(s.index2freq(u));
00175         const size_t ucal(s.freq2index(correction_factor*f));
00176         v_[u -i0    ] = std::make_pair(f, func(s[ucal]));
00177       }
00178       for (size_t u(0); u<=i1; ++u) {
00179         const double f(s.index2freq(u));
00180         const size_t ucal(s.freq2index(correction_factor*f));
00181         v_[n0-i0 + u] = std::make_pair(f, func(s[ucal]));
00182       }
00183     }
00184     return *this;
00185   }
00187   template<typename FUNCTION>
00188   frequency_vector<T> apply(const FUNCTION& func) {
00189     BOOST_FOREACH(value_type& x, v_)
00190       x.second= func(x.second);
00191     return *this;
00192   }
00193 
00195   size_t freq2index(freq_type f, bool do_throw=true) const {
00196     if (do_throw) {
00197       ASSERT_THROW(f >= fmin_ && f <= fmax_);
00198     } else {
00199       f = std::min(std::max(f, fmin_), fmax_);
00200     }
00201     return size_t(0.5+(f-fmin_)/(fmax_-fmin_) * (v_.size()-1));
00202   }
00203   
00204   const value_type& operator[](unsigned index) const { return v_[index]; }
00205 
00206   void clear() { v_.clear(); }
00207 
00208   size_t size() const { return v_.size(); }
00209 
00210   bool empty() const { return v_.empty(); }
00211 
00212   iterator       begin()       { return v_.begin(); }
00213   const_iterator begin() const { return v_.begin(); }
00214 
00215   iterator       end()       { return v_.end(); }
00216   const_iterator end() const { return v_.end(); }
00217 
00218   const value_type& front() const { return v_.front(); }
00219   value_type&       front()       { return v_.front(); }
00220 
00221   const value_type& back() const { return v_.back(); }
00222   value_type&       back()       { return v_.back(); }
00223 
00224 
00225   static bool cmpFreq(const value_type& x1, const value_type& x2) {
00226     return x1.first < x2.first;
00227   }
00228   static bool cmpSecond(const value_type& x1, const value_type& x2) {
00229     return x1.second < x2.second;
00230   }
00231 
00233   frequency_vector<T>& operator+=(const frequency_vector<T>& v) {
00234     ASSERT_THROW(size() == v.size());
00235     const_iterator j(v.begin());
00236     for (iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i,++j) {
00237       ASSERT_THROW(i->first == j->first);
00238       i->second += j->second;
00239     }
00240     return *this;
00241   }
00243   friend frequency_vector<T> operator+(const frequency_vector<T>& v1,
00244                                        const frequency_vector<T>& v2) {
00245     frequency_vector<T> r(v1); r+=v2;
00246     return r;
00247   }
00248 
00250   frequency_vector<T>& operator-=(const frequency_vector<T>& v) {
00251     ASSERT_THROW(size() != v.size());
00252     const_iterator j(v.begin());
00253     for (iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i,++j) {
00254       ASSERT_THROW(i->first == j->first);
00255       i->second -= j->second;
00256     }
00257     return *this;
00258   }
00260   friend frequency_vector<T> operator-(const frequency_vector<T>& v1,
00261                                        const frequency_vector<T>& v2) {
00262     frequency_vector<T> r(v1); r-=v2;
00263     return r;
00264   }
00265 
00267   frequency_vector<T>& operator*=(double f) {
00268     BOOST_FOREACH(value_type& x, v_) x.second *= f;
00269     return *this;
00270   }
00272   frequency_vector<T>& operator/=(double f) {
00273     BOOST_FOREACH(value_type& x, v_) x.second /= f;
00274     return *this;
00275   }
00277   friend frequency_vector<T> operator*(const frequency_vector<T>& v, double f) {
00278     frequency_vector<T> r(v); r*=f;
00279     return r;
00280   }
00282   friend frequency_vector<T> operator/(const frequency_vector<T>& v, double f) {
00283     frequency_vector<T> r(v); r/=f;
00284     return r;
00285   }
00287   friend frequency_vector<T> operator*(double f, const frequency_vector<T>& v) {    
00288     frequency_vector<T> r(v); r*=f;
00289     return r;
00290   }
00291 
00293   frequency_vector<T>& operator*=(const frequency_vector<T>& v) {
00294     ASSERT_THROW(size() == v.size());
00295     const_iterator j(v.begin());
00296     for (iterator i(begin()), iend(end()); i!=iend; ++i,++j) {
00297       ASSERT_THROW(i->first == j->first);
00298       i->second *= j->second;
00299     }
00300     return *this;
00301   }
00303   friend frequency_vector<T> operator*(const frequency_vector<T>& v1,
00304                                        const frequency_vector<T>& v2) {
00305     frequency_vector<T> r(v1); r*=v2;
00306     return r;
00307   }
00308   // use sqrt_ (defined below) in order to avoid sqrt: double -> complex
00309   friend frequency_vector<T> sqrt(frequency_vector<T> v) {
00310     return v.apply(sqrt_);
00311   }
00312 
00313 protected:
00314 private:
00315   static T sqrt_(T x) { return sqrt(x); }

00318   freq_type fmax_;
00319   vector_type v_;
00320 } ;
